did.head: Descriptive Summary

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Fanny Kemble, Accession #6987, Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased on October 29, 1962.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collections consists of a manuscript with two poems and a letter to Miss Boyle.

did.unittitle: 2 poems: "The Black Wall Flower" and "Dream Land" n.d.;
Frances Kemble to Miss Boyle n.d.;

scopecontent.p: Regrets that she has no information to offer concerning Miss Boyle's inquiries.
